Problematic for Club Name Ford.. hope pinned on 150 Lightning
As a veteran of these wars i totally agree
Endless grind down of investors here as earnings season steps into reporting numbness. It all becomes very scattershot here. I liked CSX. But will people even pay attention???
When ATT said the $1b in free cash flow was consistent with their expectations they committed to an ill-advised strategy bordering on dissembling
I was surprised IBM closed down today. I thought it was a decent quarter.

Club Members, Cramericans & Mezcal afficionados of Houston, let's hang out this Saturday at @Specs1962!

I'll be signing bottles of @FosforoMezcal with my wife Lisa at the Houston Spec's this Saturday from 2-4p. Can't wait to show H-Town what we've been working on

you interested in a $3 stock that i like very much and i never recommend $3 stocks? Watch tonight..
Nucor is doing something i have never seen before,  making a ton of money no matter what the environment. Helps that there is no more dumping.
I hate to see people lose their jobs but Amazon needs to trim down, and they are listening!!! Tonight Whole Foods...
You know we love Nucor.. it is on not done.

We are always downstream from Europe in the morning as i said last night. Looking for buys!
we are beginning to realize that office conversion into residential might be simply too expensive
Taiwan Semi admits its costs about five times more to build a fab in US than in Taiwan..and you wanted to know why they would be so dominant?
Western Alliance is back and it's stronger than ever!! that's the big takeaway so far!
Getting near being oversold!
Intuitive Surgical delivered on everything that it promised when they were on Mad Money last. Great job
glued to this Dominion lawsuit
As Investing Club members know, i thought Wells Fargo reported a remarkable quarter and is buying the heck out of its stock. I think most of the regulatory issues are behind them
Schwab's conference call was amazing. Just relentless suggestions that there was a calculated attempt to destroy the franchise. Could be an interesting opportunity if MS and GS are good
Watch Schwab. The bears need to break this one badly, it is so important to the banking crisis
bad day at Roblox
Way too negative but we did come in hot....
Stock goes higher
Does Schwab control this market today? Roblox??
Tomorrow Apple opens in India and it could be one of those moments where analysts use the excitement to bump targets
Boomer vs. Millennial. Fancy restaurant edition.

Thank you to the great people at @TotalWine in River Edge and Union for hosting me and my wife, Lisa, to showcase her @FosforoMezcal  . You were all so gracious! And, of course, thanks to all the great patrons who spent time with us

BREAKING: @Davidfaber agreed with me on something
Look, most of you want answers. You don't want free passes for stocks cut in half of banks not regulated.. you know you would lose your job. No protection for failure. No free passes here
On Amazon, i think it is reasonable to see if they have embraced anything that Zuckerberg is saying at Meta
Accountability is important no matter what business including banking. I stand with Senator Warren on this issue of regulator failure
As CNBC Investing Club members know from yesterday's Morning Meeting and Homestretch, Este Lauder is the LVMH analogue
The U.S. could buy 4000 tank killing drones from AeroVironment today and stop the Russians from further mechanized incursions

Hey NJ, let's hang out this weekend!

Heading to @TotalWine in River Edge and Union with @FosforoMezcal 

Let's talk stocks, sports and spirits - see you there!
will be on or Morning Meeting
More on my reaction to Emerson's overpay on National Instrument
Lobster Club and Fosforo made for each other!
Cramer voted off the island. Faber says "Got nothing for you"
First Republic lives to fight another day even as we saw a devastating chart by the Eye of the Market at JPM about how awful its balance sheet really is. Thank you Michael Cembalest!
soon!
Happy Easter to all!!!
Spring beckons
Proud papa showcases my baker daughter‚Äôs cookies for a birthday gig she snared; even the haters have to like these!
Yes, Costco's numbers were disappointing. But Costco has had a history of merchandise cost correcting and it will do so again. Check your club notes....

Many of the articles that question the proposed settlement between JNJ and the plaintiffs don't realize that the plaintiffs' lawyers risk getting nothing if this Supreme Court gets its hands on the case.
i am prescribing some real good medicines for the cyclical sellers.
Every day sellers come in and sell Nvidia's stock before the opening.. the fact that they don't care what price they sell it--down 4-5--tells me they are motivated to break it... Good luck with that
What's new besides First Republic and Schwab? Anything?
morning savior
Full coverage of the big talc settlement with JN  coming to all club members!
You wont believe the bank stock i talk positively about tonight!!!

At a minimum can we at least replace the people who are in charge of the San Fran Fed? This was a one-off run that has raised the cost of credit for everyone, one-off in that the examiners, the fed, knew and did nothing and the disease spread because of the fed

Do you not think it is amazing that we don't the names of the examiners that caused so much pain in the banking system but we know the ref who blew the call against the Eagles in the Super Bowl? Out them! They blew the call. Fire them and out them.
she's right, and she's right about shaming the examiners!
tonight, value traps, or value jewels.. we tell you what we are seeing
Why do the bears always rule? Check out your Sunday piece, club members, for the truth about these markets
Club members know our view on the oils and we have bought them all the way down, but why did the bears think OPEC + wouldn't try to stop the decline?Afterall, the president never bought back the oil
Why does everyone hate the oil stocks so much??
not sure on these guys
if they could only figure out how not to lose money
and everyone said trade it don‚Äôt own it.
hint: tonight‚Äôs show

AI, that's the story.. It's changing the world...
Wow-- Senator Warren is about making the system safe and having the scofflaws pay. How is that not exactly what we want!!!!
Too early to buy
After listening to Tim Massad on last night's show (former head of the CFTC) I would not do business with Binance. Just way too sketchy
end of quarter mark up
oh here he goes with that credit crunch stuff
let‚Äôs have dinner and then catch jimmy chill
Bringing some old school Mad Money action to tonight‚Äôs top of show
good close
let‚Äôs put our heads together and solve this crisis
i like the action in First Republic here
Bizarre happy days are here again feeling here
Some great crypto insights tonight from the person i think knows the most on the topic... @MadMoneyOnCNBC
Paramount to the 50s!!! Holy Cow!!!!
If you short Footlocker i am allowing you to wear this number
End of the month love affair with stocks based on false assumptions of future earnings coupled with a stayed fed hand because of banking gone wild
UBS says sell Footlocker, if you do this please remember to invite me to your funeral
This CFTC Binance complaint is about a company gone rogue....
This is why Powell's job is so difficult
Club members check out that buy of Footlocker by Mary Dillon. She is cadre
LULU lemon shorts, go buy some clothes and cover up!
$baba --lets just sucker in the Americans again. They are such fools. Let's just play 'e,
doing another draft of my CNBC Investing Club talk today at noon. Very self-critical, very remonstrative; only way you can learn. Join!
Remember when Nat Gas was supposed to wreck the world in price? It's finishing its worst q EVER!
watch the top of tonight's @MadMoneyOnCNBC
PVH joins the ranks of RL as apparel stocks worth owning
First Bancshares of Faber and Cramer wants in!!
I see Morgan Stanley's Mike Wilson is out with earnings risk piece... That's a clarion call to sell the cyclicals which i would not obey...
Let the brokers downgrade CAT, it is a 2024 story we like at the club as you will know from our monthly club meeting when it convenes tomorrow.
First Citizens will give a blueprint for any bank to buy First Republic. At last FDIC is up to speed
First Citizens will be an interesting match with the folks in the Valley. I think that this shows there is real value in the carcass

Highly unusual and positive story about Elliott Partners and Salesforce on the excellent work that CRM is doing. We will highlight this at our Morning Meeting as verification of the commitment of Marc Benioff to profitable growth
Why could be market be up? A lot about it in tonight's CNBC  Investing Club think piece..A lot to chew on ahead of our upcoming club call....
Addressed in my coming CNBC Investing Club think piece tonight in a way that puts it all into context
Bad link, just click on my avatar to sign up
Just finished long think piece for cnbc/investingclub/ members only. I thin that most of your questions about this market today will be answered by it.
Commercial Real Estate is a real threat but it isn't as looming on the balance sheet because it has real value in a market where there are very strong regions. NYC and SF are exceptions
then it will be on to the commercial real estate market. The good news there is that we know from 90-92 it is very hard to bring down because there are so many options and so little huge leases.
If the Feds can stem First Republic then they have a plan for the others that explains the strength of the regional index
Still can't talk, giving vocal cords a rest. Really blew them out in last night's show.. Full stop

One hundred billion in deposits get pulled out. That's quite small. I am doing a big piece for club members that will set the scene for next week. I think you should join the club as we have plenty of interpretation to do..
Yeah,  I noticed this.. Very telling... Mean reversion...
Dow Jones coming back... post-europe
As Europe winds down does the U.S. ramp? Or does it ramp and then go down because of fears that a bank stock goes to zero on Monday
What's Howie Doing? This !!!
How many basis points are the credit issues worth. I think that it's like four .25 hikes
Perfect timing as Deutsche Banks does some terrific and long-needed disclosure of how it is doing post CS. Obvious ploy to get German government to zero out equity and shotgun bank to low bidder..
Now panicked flight to quality out of Europe and usual scares about our banks.... where were these sellers yesterday?
How many of the 150 million users of Tiktok vote? it doesn‚Äôt matter if they are ‚Äúdeprived.‚Äù They will just go to an improved Reels, still one more reason to own Club favorite $META

I have tremendous respect for Secretary Yellen but Fed Chief Powell seems more aware that if things go downhill from here it could be like a 150 basis point tightening. I left work feel very concerned that much good was undone today

I truly do not understand what Treasury Secretary Yellen was thinking today. We had a real opportunity to work our way through this one before she explicitly said that there's no big plan to help depositors. A simple: "we have the power to do what's necessary" was called for
Is a credit crunch worth 150bps? that's what we have to think about

Our superstar producer, Katie Spencer, had her last day downtown at the NYSE today! 

Katie, thank you for your tireless work and dedication to the show. We will miss you so much, but we know that you will shine in your next endeavor!

call @davidfaber and say your bank is fine and does that mean you are being invited to that bank's funeral???
Yes, the stock of Nvidia has had quite a move already. But Nvidia is now making cards that will create the unimaginable for all.. It is that powerful a story and its lead is stunning
I can't say this enough: Open AI would not exist without Nvidia. Jensen delivered the first NVIDIA DGX supercomputer to Open AI in 2016!! Seven years ago!!!
Nvidia today--what a story. Watch Jensen tonight!!!
Gamestop's q will cause more covering than this,  and i am not as anxious about Nike's future as many others.
Are deposits fleeing from all regional banks? $FRC is no reason to guarantee all deposits. And I think you would need congressional approval. Offering a  better plan on tonight's @MadMoneyOnCNBC

Jensen's GTC keynotes are the most thought-provoking and thoughtful lessons you may ever hear. It shouldn't move the stock and hasn't in the past but this time could be different because of all the "chats" that run on it
Today is the day when we learn about how AI actually is going to work in ALL of our loves. Today is Jensen Huang's keynote, Nvidia, 11:00 a.m. Eastern..
The $FRC torture will continue at its regularly scheduled 9:30 a.m. hour
$FRC can be ringfenced by putting it in receivership  and ending this charade as we don't know the outflows so it is hard to bid for this moving target

If you wait until every bank resolution is completed you will miss the big moves back up. $FRB is disappointing as you know the big banks seem uninterested at any price other than a terminal one for shareholders.
As we said in the Morning Meeting, tech and banks and even oils can go higher because the marking IS that oversold
I‚Äôm still standing!
Yes we will talk about FRC and the world of MS and WFC.. not just the techs!!!! Morning Meeting for club members only

When i was bottle signing this weekend at the Total Wine in Boca I got a lot of questions about Nvidia ahead of the keynote tomorrow. Really glad the stock is coming in ahead of it.. Feared big decline on "sell the news."
Prepping for Morning Meeting with @jeffmarkscnbc who is as bummed as I am, I bet, about the loss of CJ... for the @Eagles
Regional bank ringfence... HBAN cheapest...
Watch JP Morgan, it's stock will tell you what to do with the group...
Investing Club members, calling in from vacation for our Morning Meeting..
Every bank wants to buy First Republic for nothing and some sort of indemnity for their hard-to-value loan portfolio which includes lots of loans against "pre-IPO" stock

The Street doesn't seem to realize that this market loves companies with great balance sheets and not much love for others.  We have to wait out the denouement of First Republic and what that franchise is really worth.
